dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Why don't we look at it this way?

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Did you know that a new League of Nine has been formed in N Corp?

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: They seem to be recruiting the old members and their technologies, similar to what you tried to do.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Though, it looks like they're trying to erase that past, rather.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: This is purely conjecture, but we're all doomed to die at the hands of our dear fellow Gubo and be taxidermied, one after another.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: All I did was bring that predetermined death a bit earlier.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Besides... You've gone too far for our past friendship to forgive, Dongbaek.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Ahh~ I was looking forward to the staff dinner tomorrow, I really was.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Come on, then... It's time you ceased the bloom, Dongbaek.
With the Golden Bough in hand, Dongrang stabs Dongbaek without hesitation.
But why…

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: I could state many reasons, but... right, let's say this is my parting act of compassion.

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: ...I knew I'd have to wilt when the time came, but...

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: I... always...

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: Wished to be a bud... soon to bloom, bearing the scent within...

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: Like you, Yi Sang... How you dreamed... of flying...

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: Like that... I just... wanted to be buried... under a piquant scent of flowers... with you all...

dataList.title: K Corp.
dataList.content: New feed has been added.
Soon, the screen is filled with yellow petals.

dataList.title: League of Nine Littérateurs
dataList.content: Thank you, Yi Sang. For showing me such a moment.

dataList.title: League of Nine Littérateurs
dataList.content: I would dedicate my entire life to repay you for this favor...

dataList.title: League of Nine Littérateurs
dataList.content: Hey, Yi Sang, what say you to setting up a lab with me? I get the feeling every day spent with you will be a fun one.

dataList.title: League of Nine Littérateurs
dataList.content: Amazing, Yi Sang. Unlike me, you attempted to reflect the true image in all its uprightness.

dataList.title: League of Nine Littérateurs
dataList.content: The images don't overlap... They aren't blurry or shaky.

dataList.title: League of Nine Littérateurs
dataList.content: Yi Sang, you're too lax.

dataList.title: League of Nine Littérateurs
dataList.content: Why on earth would you leave it as a plaything when it can be so much more?
Be still.
Just be still, and do nothing more than breathe.
For now, that's how you must live.
You cannot fly.
The League has fallen apart! We have to leave this place.
Yi Sang, you will come with me.
You can close your eyes if you so wish. Since you're too faint-hearted, I'll see ahead in your stead.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: What are you thinking?
Nothing.
<color=#d4e1e8>And the scent of the grave was in full bloom.</color>
